str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To pass through, spread (as a report). From dia and erchomai; to traverse.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
A part, portion, share. From an obsolete but more primary form of meiromai; a division or share.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Hellas, the native name for Greece. Of uncertain affinity; Hellas, a country of Europe.
